item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:30 Chances: Palantir’s AI prowess is years in the making. The stock has been on fire thanks to increasing demand for artificial intelligence (AI). There’s probably much more where that came from. Palantir’s huge government contract win has plenty of positive implications for shareholders.
